entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: RadarScope
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2ï¼š$99.99 â†’ $14.99 [$14.99 ~ $99.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2ï¼š$14.99
  • Pro Tier 1ï¼š$9.99
  • RadarScope Pro Subscriptionï¼š$9.99

Application Description

RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities. Whether youâ€™re scanning for a mesocycloneâ€™s tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricaneâ€™s eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radarâ€™s scanning strategy. Your initial app purchase includes the following: â€¢ Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany â€¢ 6-frame radar loops â€¢ Two built-in providers for radar data â€¢ Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, marine, snow squall, extreme wind, tropical, and other warnings in the US â€¢ Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia â€¢ NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes â€¢ Inspector and distance tools â€¢ Color palette options for radar data â€¢ AllisonHouse data plan integration â€¢ Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting â€¢ mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL â€¢ Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use â€¢ Support for widgets and complications â€¢ Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV â€¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather: â€¢ 30-frame radar loops â€¢ Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes â€¢ Severe weather watches in the US and Canada â€¢ Special weather statements in the US and Canada â€¢ Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions â€¢ SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks â€¢ WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US â€¢ Local storm reports in the US â€¢ Custom color palette support â€¢ Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices) â€¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including: â€¢ Everything in Pro Tier One â€¢ 50-frame radar loops â€¢ A third provider for US radar data â€¢ NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive â€¢ Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive â€¢ Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive â€¢ GOES East and GOES West satellite products â€¢ NSSLâ€™s Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products â€¢ NCEPâ€™s Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products â€¢ Surface observations â€¢ Atmospheric soundings in the US â€¢ Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive â€¢ More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps â€¢ Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA â€¢ Server-sent events for radar and warning updates â€¢ Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices â€¢ Family sharing support If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period. DTN is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Our privacy policy is available for review at https://www.dtn.com/privacy-policy/ Please visit our web site for more information.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Otter - Food & Meal Diary
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$1.99 â†’ $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $1.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.99

Application Description

Otter is a simple and beautiful food diary app that helps you track what you eat every day. No calorie counting, no complicated databases â€“ just take photos, add notes, and reflect on your eating habits. â—† WHY OTTER? - Clean, minimal design with an adorable otter character - Photo-based meal tracking â€“ snap and save - No ads, no distractions - iCloud sync across all your devices â—† FEATURES - Photo Food Journal Capture your meals with photos. A picture is worth a thousand calories â€“ see what you eat at a glance. - Daily Notes Write about your day, how you felt, or what made each meal special. - Water Tracker Stay hydrated! Track your daily water intake with simple tap controls. - Weight Log Monitor your weight trends over time with easy-to-read records. - Timeline View Browse your food history in a beautiful timeline. See patterns in your eating habits. - Search & Stats Find past meals quickly and view your eating statistics. - iCloud Sync Your food diary stays safe and syncs automatically across iPhone, iPad, and Mac. â—† A MINDFUL APPROACH TO EATING Otter doesn't judge. There's no calorie counting or strict diet plans. Just a gentle companion to help you become more aware of what you eat. You are what you eat â€“ let Otter help you remember it. Questions? Contact us at OtterDietDiary@gmail.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Notes Writer Pro 2026
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$14.99 â†’ $9.99 [Free ~ $14.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • Notes Writer Pro AI Assistantï¼š$1.99

Application Description

You have lecture notes to take, a story to tell, article to publish, whether itâ€™s todayâ€™s journal entry, tomorrowâ€™s thesis, highlight important things in ebooks and PDFs, fill out a PDF form or get the most from your business meetings. Notes Writer is an excellent assistant in study and business, also being effective for writing down your ideas and thoughts and sharing them! Students, teachers, writers, doctors, journalists, scholars and business professionals use Notes Writer daily to store notes, annotations, memos, signed PDFs, papers, highlighted PDF text-books, lectures and more. With Notes Writer Pro you can: + WRITE. EDIT. FORMAT Â· Write Everywhere: Use Notes Writer as an stand-alone writing app even if you donâ€™t have a computer or you are offline in the wilds Â· Create rich text format (RTF) and advanced Markdown (MD) documents Â· Define margins, headers/footers, paper sizes, MLA and APA style format Â· Live counters: characters, words, sentences, lines, Avg. Word length, Words per sentence & reading time Â· Text to Speech for proofreading Â· Dictation lets you speak text instead of typing Â· Typewriter: Distraction-Free mode, letting you focus on what youâ€™re writing Â· Over 30 languages typing support including Japanese, Chinese, Arabic & Hebrew Â· Extra keys: tab, forward delete, cursor up/down/left/right, etc. + ANNOTATE PDFs. FILL FORMS. SIGN DOCUMENTS. Â· PDF Annotations: highlight, strikeout, underline, notes, voice notes, pencil, stamp, sign... Â· Fill out forms. Supports PDF AcroForms standard Â· Sign with your own signature documents, contracts, forms Â· Digital Signature Validation + ORGANIZE. STRUCTURE. FIND. Â· Organize your work in unlimited notebooks, folders and subfolders Â· Create notebooks and projects in your own tree-like structure: Sections, Classes, Lectures, Grades, Drafts, Folders, Chapters, Research, etc. Â· Design the cover of your notebooks Â· Full-text search your library of documents and projects + SCAN NOTES. RESEARCH. PDF LIBRARY Â· Split view: Open two PDFs or handwritten notes simultaneously on screen. Compare or use them as book and paper Â· Full PDF reader and manager included for reference files, text books, ebooks, articles, resources, papers, etc. Â· Use the camera of your iPad/iPhone to scan documents, notes, recipes, tickets, etc. as PDF Â· Open PowerPoint, Word and Excel files + SHARE NOTES. EXPORT PDF, HTMLâ€¦ Â· Open attachments directly from the Mail app Â· Sync via iCloud, Dropbox, Box, WebDAV and Google Drive Â· Convert to multiple formats RTF, Markdown, PDF, ePub, HTML, RTFD, TXT, etc. Â· Zip folders/notebooks and email them + AUTOMATIC BACKUPS. BE SAFE. PROTECT YOUR WORK Â· Protect your work with an app security passcode Â· Protect any folder or project with a passcode Â· Automatic Backups of your notes and notebooks Notes Writer is more than an innovative, fast and reliable note-taking, PDF annotator and writing app designed for anyone who take notes or writes. This is a smart notepad and writing workspace for your iPad and iPhone. Privacy Policy http://www.noteswriter.com/Kairoos_Privacy_Policy.html EULA https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DayCost Pro - Personal Finance
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$2.99 â†’ Free [Free ~ $2.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

Three seconds a bill. Fast, Security and Easy to use is our aim, and iOS notification center widget. Look at other people how to say: â— I just downloaded this app and I am so loving it already! It seems easy to use but I need to explore it more. â— Very innovative work. Keep up guys. 5 star app. â— It's quick to note down your expenses and helps you track your money. â— Polished, smart, simple, with all functions of apps of this kind. Exactly the one I was looking for. Makes me delete other similar apps on my phone and keep only this one, really. â— I love this app! It is clean, beautiful, very customizable, and user-friendly. I love the ability to make your own categories and accounts. And I also love the ability to put it in your pull-down Notification Center on your phone. It makes it quickly accessible during the day. Great job, love the app! Apple Watch: You can create incomes and expenses from your Apple Watch. The Glance shows your expenses of today, this month. Featureï¼š â— Three seconds only: pull down, fill money, choose category â— iOS notification center widget: you can easily account when iPhone lock screen â— Passcode security: everyone cannot open, only you. even double-click the Home button, in the App list can not view the data â— Support more than 160 kinds of currency, conversion exchange rate automatic updates â— Calculator: built-in calculator, more convenient and faster â— Full gestures: fast billing basic â— Humane beginners guide: for special operations, we guide the way through the animation + text, more intuitive, easier to understand â— iCloud backup & restore â— Dropbox backup & restore â— Export data to CSV via Email â— Recurring event, both expenses and incomes, with rich frequency options. â— Allow custom theme color and wallpaper. â— Allow add transaction from template. Basicï¼š â— Expense & Income bills can be added photos â— Income, Expense, Transfer, the others have â— Graphical reports, allowing you to easily view the balance of payments situation year / month / week â— Budget management: give yourself a reason to control consumption â— A variety of color themes and wallpaper, allows you to fully personalize â— Custom categories and consumption expenditure accounts, more in line with your needs â— Supports iPhone & iPad â— Daily reminder Increaseï¼š â— Easy copy history through gestures and automatically positioned in the day consumption date, you only need to modify the money can be. of course, you can use the existing money saved directly â— You can also add categories and account when billing editing, click on the banner to change currency If you give up because of difficulties If you give up because of busy If you want to know where expenses If you want to save money If ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ Try our "DayCost" it, she will be your best assistant URL Schemes: DayCost:// Help translate DayCost: Contribute to the DayCost translation in your language. Let's make DayCost available to everyone in the world! We will show translator's info in DayCost, if you so desire. In addition, we also give several redemption code as a gift. have any suggestions or comments, please write to usï¼šsupport@daycost.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Island Story: 100 Days
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$1.99 â†’ $0.99 [Free ~ $2.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.99

Application Description

You are shipwrecked on a desert island. â–  Easy-to-Play â€¢ Tap to move and gather. â–  Survival â€¢ Eating only wild fruits will not fill your stomach. â€¢ Catch fish through a mini-game, or craft traps to obtain meat. â–  In-Depth Health System â€¢ Staying healthy is a constant challenge. â€¢ Manage a complex simulation including: Weight, Wounds, Hunger, Thirst, Energy, Body Temperature, Insect Bitesâ€¦ â–  Upgrade Your Camp â€¢ Gather resources to craft tools and build new furniture. â–  Dynamic Weather â€¢ Different weather can limit your movements and may disrupt your plans for the day. â–  Self-Sufficient â€¢ Discover how to grow crops and raise goats. Make your own bread from scratch. â–  Relaxation â€¢ Natural white noise. --------- Offline Play Â· Ad-Free

entry.title: Photo Eraser for iPhone
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$1.99 â†’ Free [Free ~ $1.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

On Sale. Original $ 4.99. Photo Eraser magically remove unwanted objects from photos for iPhone and instantly fix your photos. Powered by the latest revolutionary photo InPaint algorithm, Photo Eraser performs the best among all other iPhone erasers that ruin your photos, including popular professional photo processing softwares. A variety of experiments shows the intelligent Photo Eraser will give you better and more natural, amazing results than any similar tools. Photo Eraser quickly remove unwanted objects from photos for iPhone, including logo, text, data stamp, watermark, acnes, people... without any specialist knowledge and instantly fix the photos automatically as if they were never there. InPaint, improve and repair your photos. It targets to be a simple yet effective photo healing app for all iPhone users. Get the magical photos done in seconds-to-minutes instead of minutes-to-hours. People all over the world use Photo Eraser for iPhone every day to beautify their photos. Free download Eraser for iPhone today to be more creativity! Easy to get use & started. You only need mark unwanted area by red color, Photo Eraser for iPhone will make your photo much better in a minute. â€¨â€¨ Photo Eraser for iPhone features highlights: â€¨ âˆš Remove watermarks, date stamps and much more unwanted objects from photos for iPhone.â€¨ âˆš Delete unwanted people from photo for iPhone. â€¨ âˆš Erase text, signatures and other undated objects from photos for iPhone. â€¨ âˆš Make skin imperfections vanish for iPhone. â€¨ âˆš Completely non-technical. âˆš Support all iPhone device: iPhone 6s+, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6+, iPhone6, iPhone 5s, iPhone5c, iPhones 5, iPhones 4s, iPhone4, iPhone 3gsâ€¦ â€¢ Reviews by our users: - Works pretty well! by rfgf1 It does a fairly thorough job of removing things from the backgrounds of pictures, or objects that are not in the main focus of the original. Using the lasso and only straight lines and drawing a box around the object to be removed, is where I have seen my best results. - Amazing by Twon from VA Works great! I'm using a iPhone 6, IOS 8 Feedback: â€¨Any suggestion will be appreciated, support email: market@effectmatrix.com

  • Corrupted Packï¼š$6.99

Application Description

The new game of the developer ""GameCoaster"", who made Dungeon Maker and Dungeon Defense! A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss. Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory. Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss. You are tasked with infiltrating a planet dominated by light all on your own. You must bring down the heroes and use them to summon monsters to fight alongside you, armed with the equipment of these fallen sacrifices. Once you are strong enough, you may receive the blessings of the Dark Gods, and combine their powers with those of your monsters to bring down colossal groups of enemies. â—‡ 10 elite monsters and over 100 unique skills â—‡ The Power of the Abyss gets stronger as you rebuild â—‡ Roguelike with random choices and opportunities

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$6.39

In-App Purchases

  • The End Of Karma(DLC)ï¼š$3.59

Application Description

While the rich stinks of meat and wine, the bones of the poor litter the roadside. Great injustice often leads to strange occurrences Snow in July can only be remedied through blood. Warm Snow is a Roguelike action game with a background set in a dark fantasy world, where the eerie 'Warm Snow' holds sway. You will play as the Warrior 'Bi-an' on a crusade against the Five Great Clans, in order to save a world teetering on the brink of destruction. ã€A Dark Tale of Sword and Snowã€‘ A strange phenomenon appeared during the 27th Year of the Longwu Era. Snow fell from the sky, which was warm rather than cold to the touch, and did not melt. People who breathed in the 'Warm Snow' lost their minds and became monsters. This phenomenon was later known as 'Warm Snow'. Embark on a journey as Warrior 'Bi-an' to search for the truth behind the 'Warm Snow' and put an end to the this never-ending darkness. ã€Countless Combinationsã€‘ Seven sects, varied Relics, unpredictable excaliburs, the game is full of Rogue-like elements which will keep each challenge in your journey fresh and unique. Each time you venture into the world would be a whole-new experience, pick your favorite playing style and challenge yourself. ã€Thrilling Flying Sword Systemã€‘ Perform critical destruction with swords that flicker between shadow and light. Control your flying swords with different attributes, attack modes and Relic boosts. ã€Reincarnate and Collect the Fragments of Truthã€‘ You decide how you will grow stronger! Boost your abilities with talent points that you can assign at will. The truth about this world is hidden in the randomly dropped 'Memory Fragments'. Are you ready to discover the secrets behind the Five Great Clans and reveal the truth of this world? ã€Mobile Version Optimizationsã€‘ Â· Button customization and Auto-Dash: Adjust the position and size of buttons according to your preferences. Enable the Auto-Dash feature to start auto dashing with the left joystick. Â· Adjust the viewing distance freely: Adjust the size of the screen display according to your preferences. Â· Auto Enemy Tracking: Enable the Auto Enemy Tracking feature for a silky smooth combat experience. Minimum device requirement: iOS 12.0 or higher. Memory requirement: 4GB. Available RAM: 4GB SUPPORT If you encounter any issues during the game, you can send us feedback via the in-game Customer Service Center. Customer Service Email: warmsnowgh@bilibili.com Official Site: https://warmsnow.biligames.com Twitterï¼šhttps://twitter.com/WarmSnowGame Discord: https://discord.gg/gC2nRfEQ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@warmsnow6951

entry.title: 3D Pinball Space Cadet
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Remove Adsï¼š$2.99 â†’ $0.00 [$0.00 ~ $2.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$3.99

In-App Purchases

  • Remove Adsï¼š$0.00

Application Description

The table features the player as a member of a space fleet that completes missions to increase rank. Players can attain nine different ranks (listed from lowest to highest): Cadet, Ensign, Lieutenant, Captain, LT Commander, Commander, Commodore, Admiral, and Fleet Admiral. Players accept a mission by hitting "mission targets" which select which mission they will take, and by going up the "launch ramp". Each mission has a set number of things for players to do, such as hitting the "attack bumpers" (which are a set of four bumpers at the top of the table) eight times (this is the "target practice" mission). Some missions involve a number of steps which must be completed in sequence. Missions end either by being completed, or by being aborted due to running out of "fuel", as indicated by the lights in the passage that passes under the launch ramp. The "fuel" lights go out one by one at a time interval, and can be re-lit by having the ball go over them, or all at once by going up the launch ramp again. Upon completing a mission, some of the blue lights in a circle in the middle of the table turn on. When all of the lights in the blue circle turn on, the player's rank increases, and a light in the orange circle turns on.

Application Screenshot

iPhone
